alert.note: Alert for East Sweetwater County; Rock Springs and Green River (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 26 at 2:56AM MST until December 26 at 7:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. Snow showers could cause reduced visibility and slick winter travel. * WHERE...Rock Springs, Green River, and East Sweetwater County. This includes much of I-80 in southern Wyoming. * WHEN...From 9 AM this morning to 7 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Visibility could be reduced due to blowing snow.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: East Sweetwater County; Rock Springs and Green River
